definition: once/already/ever (in the past)/former/previously/(past tense marker used before verb or clause)

sentences.english: Gary's great-grandma grew aghast at Gary's poor grammar.
sentences.chinese: 加里的曾祖母对加里那糟糕的语法感到很惊讶。

sentences.english: She was someone from my great-grandmother's side of the family, and lived in the country in a small county in northern Jiangsu.
sentences.chinese: 是曾祖母娘家人，在江苏北部一个小县份的乡下住着。

sentences.english: The girl throws back to her great-great-grandmother, who had that unusually red hair.
sentences.chinese: 这女孩长得像她那位生着一头特别红头发的远曾祖母。

sentences.english: The houseboat on the banks of the Mississippi in which my great-grandmother lived.
sentences.chinese: 我曾祖母住在密西西比河附近，在河堤旁有一艘游艇。

sentences.english: Annie: My great-grandfather gave it to my great-grandmother when they got married.
sentences.chinese: 我的曾祖父把它送给了我的曾祖母，在他们结婚时。

sentences.english: My great-grandparents were Jewish immigrants from Eastern Europe.
sentences.chinese: 我的曾祖父曾祖母是来自东欧的犹太移民。

sentences.english: She was, by one rough estimate, your 10,000th—great—grand –mother.
sentences.chinese: 粗略估算一下，她是你的第前10，000代曾祖母。

sentences.english: Your great great grandma probably kept egg money for the same reason.
sentences.chinese: 你的曾曾祖母藏着卖鸡蛋攒下的钱可能也是一个道理。

sentences.english: Our great -grand- mother was killed just because her nose was exposed.
sentences.chinese: 我们的曾祖母仅仅因为鼻子露出来了就被处死了。

sentences.english: That's not the end of the "goat man", or so my Great grandma calls him.
sentences.chinese: 到这“羊人”的故事还没完，曾祖母是这么称呼他的。

sentences.english: My great-grandmother died of a heart attack while the Germans were shelling those men.
sentences.chinese: 德军炮轰他们时，我曾祖母因心脏病去世了。

sentences.english: Great-grandma waved at us as my father pulled out of the driveway.
sentences.chinese: 父亲把车开到车道上时，曾祖母挥手和我们告别。

sentences.english: She was, by one rough estimate, your 10,000th-great-grandmother.
sentences.chinese: 粗略的估计一下，她会是您的第一万代曾祖母。

sentences.english: Perhaps her great-grandmother had something to do with this.
sentences.chinese: 或许是她的曾祖母教会了她这一点。

sentences.english: She told me that my great-grandmother was still living in the surroundings of Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 我的外曾祖母还住在北京的郊区。

sentences.english: And my great-grandmother most certainly was.
sentences.chinese: 我的曾祖母一定也是这样的。

definition: (informal) grandma (paternal grandmother)/(respectful) mistress of the house/CL:位[wei4]/(coll.) boobies/breasts
